  <b>Fiber</b>æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå—åˆ°<a href="https://github.com/expressjs/express"> Express </a>å¯å‘çš„<b>Webæ¡†æ¶</b>ï¼ŒåŸºäºä½¿ç”¨
<a href="https://go.dev/doc/"> Go </a>è¯­è¨€ç¼–å†™çš„<b>æœ€å¿«çš„ HTTP å¼•æ“</b>
<a href="https://github.com/valyala/fasthttp"> Fasthttp </a>æ„å»ºã€‚æ—¨åœ¨é€šè¿‡<b>é›¶å†…å­˜åˆ†é…</b>å’Œ<b>é«˜æ€§èƒ½æœåŠ¡</b>ï¼Œä½¿<b>å¿«é€Ÿ</b>å¼€å‘æ›´åŠ ç®€ä¾¿ã€‚
</p>

## âš¡ï¸ å¿«é€Ÿå…¥é—¨

```go
package main

import "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Get("/", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendString("Hello, World ğŸ‘‹!")
    })

    app.Listen(":3000")
}
```

## ğŸ¤– åŸºå‡†æµ‹è¯•

è¿™äº›æµ‹è¯•ç”± [TechEmpower](https://www.techempower.com/benchmarks/#section=data-r19&hw=ph&test=plaintext) å’Œ [Go Web](https://github.com/smallnest/go-web-framework-benchmark) å®Œæˆã€‚å¦‚æœæ‚¨æƒ³æŸ¥çœ‹æ‰€æœ‰ç»“æœï¼Œè¯·è®¿é—®æˆ‘ä»¬çš„ [Wiki](https://docs.gofiber.io/extra/benchmarks) ã€‚

## âš™ï¸ å®‰è£…

ç¡®ä¿å·²å®‰è£… `1.17` æˆ–æ›´é«˜ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„ Go ([ä¸‹è½½](https://go.dev/dl/))ã€‚

é€šè¿‡åˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å¹¶åœ¨æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å†…è¿è¡Œ `go mod init github.com/your/repo` ([äº†è§£æ›´å¤š](https://go.dev/blog/using-go-modules)) æ¥åˆå§‹åŒ–é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œç„¶åä½¿ç”¨ [`go get`](https://pkg.go.dev/cmd/go/#hdr-Add_dependencies_to_current_module_and_install_them) å‘½ä»¤å®‰è£… Fiberï¼š

```bash
go get -u github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2
```

## ğŸ’¡ å“²å­¦

ä» [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/about/) åˆ‡æ¢åˆ° [Go](https://go.dev/doc/) çš„æ–° `gopher` åœ¨å¼€å§‹æ„å»º `Web`
åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºæˆ–å¾®æœåŠ¡ä¹‹å‰éœ€è¦ç»å†ä¸€æ®µè‰°éš¾çš„å­¦ä¹ è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚ è€Œ `Fiber`ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº**æç®€ä¸»ä¹‰**å¹¶ä¸”éµå¾ª **UNIX æ–¹å¼**åˆ›å»ºçš„ **Web æ¡†æ¶**ï¼Œ
ä½¿æ–°çš„ `gopher` å¯ä»¥åœ¨çƒ­çƒˆå’Œå¯ä¿¡èµ–çš„æ¬¢è¿ä¸­è¿…é€Ÿè¿›å…¥ `Go` çš„ä¸–ç•Œã€‚

`Fiber`å—åˆ°äº†äº’è”ç½‘ä¸Šæœ€æµè¡Œçš„`Web`æ¡†æ¶`Express`çš„**å¯å‘** ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬ç»“åˆäº†`Express`çš„**æ˜“ç”¨æ€§**å’Œ`Go`çš„**åŸå§‹æ€§èƒ½** ã€‚å¦‚æœæ‚¨æ›¾ç»ä½¿ç”¨`Node.js`æ„å»º`Web`åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åº(_ä½¿ç”¨ Express æˆ–ç±»ä¼¼æ¡†æ¶_)ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè®¸å¤šæ–¹æ³•å’ŒåŸç†å¯¹æ‚¨æ¥è¯´åº”è¯¥**éå¸¸æ˜“æ‡‚**ã€‚

æˆ‘ä»¬ä¼š**å€¾å¬**ç”¨æˆ·åœ¨ [issues](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues)ï¼ŒDiscord [channel](https://gofiber.io/discord)
ä»¥åŠåœ¨äº’è”ç½‘ä¸Šçš„æ‰€æœ‰è¯‰æ±‚ï¼Œä¸ºäº†åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªèƒ½è®©æœ‰ç€ä»»ä½•æŠ€æœ¯æ ˆçš„å¼€å‘è€…éƒ½èƒ½åœ¨ deadline å‰å®Œæˆä»»åŠ¡çš„**è¿…é€Ÿ**ï¼Œ**çµæ´»**ä»¥åŠ**å‹å¥½**çš„ `Go web` æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œå°±åƒ `Express` åœ¨ `JavaScript` ä¸–ç•Œä¸­ä¸€æ ·ã€‚

## âš ï¸ é™åˆ¶
* ç”±äº Fiber ä½¿ç”¨äº† unsafe ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´å…¶å¯èƒ½ä¸æœ€æ–°çš„ Go ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸å…¼å®¹ã€‚Fiber 2.40.0 å·²ç»åœ¨ Go 1.17 åˆ° 1.21 ä¸Šæµ‹è¯•è¿‡ã€‚
* Fiber ä¸ net/http æ¥å£ä¸å…¼å®¹ã€‚ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´ä½ æ— æ³•ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ä¾‹å¦‚ gqlenï¼Œgo-swagger æˆ–è€…ä»»ä½•å…¶ä»–å±äº net/http ç”Ÿæ€çš„é¡¹ç›®ã€‚

## ğŸ‘€ ç¤ºä¾‹

ä¸‹é¢åˆ—å‡ºäº†ä¸€äº›å¸¸è§ç¤ºä¾‹ã€‚å¦‚æœæ‚¨æƒ³æŸ¥çœ‹æ›´å¤šä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œè¯·è®¿é—®æˆ‘ä»¬çš„ [Recipes](https://github.com/gofiber/recipes) ä»£ç åº“æˆ– [API æ–‡æ¡£](https://docs.gofiber.io) ã€‚

#### ğŸ“– [**åŸºç¡€è·¯ç”±**](https://docs.gofiber.io/#basic-routing)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // GET /api/register
    app.Get("/api/*", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("âœ‹ %s", c.Params("*"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => âœ‹ register
    })

    // GET /flights/LAX-SFO
    app.Get("/flights/:from-:to", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ’¸ From: %s, To: %s", c.Params("from"), c.Params("to"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => ğŸ’¸ From: LAX, To: SFO
    })

    // GET /dictionary.txt
    app.Get("/:file.:ext", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ“ƒ %s.%s", c.Params("file"), c.Params("ext"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => ğŸ“ƒ dictionary.txt
    })

    // GET /john/75
    app.Get("/:name/:age/:gender?", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ‘´ %s is %s years old", c.Params("name"), c.Params("age"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => ğŸ‘´ john is 75 years old
    })

    // GET /john
    app.Get("/:name", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("Hello, %s ğŸ‘‹!", c.Params("name"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => Hello john ğŸ‘‹!
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

#### ğŸ“– [**è·¯ç”±å‘½å**](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#name)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // GET /api/register
    app.Get("/api/*", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("âœ‹ %s", c.Params("*"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => âœ‹ register
    }).Name("api")

    data, _ := json.MarshalIndent(app.GetRoute("api"), "", "  ")
    fmt.Print(string(data))
    // Prints:
    // {
    //    "method": "GET",
    //    "name": "api",
    //    "path": "/api/*",
    //    "params": [
    //      "*1"
    //    ]
    // }


    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

#### ğŸ“– [**é™æ€æ–‡ä»¶**](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#static)æœåŠ¡

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Static("/", "./public")
    // => http://localhost:3000/js/script.js
    // => http://localhost:3000/css/style.css

    app.Static("/prefix", "./public")
    // => http://localhost:3000/prefix/js/script.js
    // => http://localhost:3000/prefix/css/style.css

    app.Static("*", "./public/index.html")
    // => http://localhost:3000/any/path/shows/index/html

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

#### ğŸ“– [**ä¸­é—´ä»¶**](https://docs.gofiber.io/category/-middleware)å’Œ [**Next**](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#next)

```go
func main() {
	app := fiber.New()

	// Match any route
	app.Use(func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
		fmt.Println("ğŸ¥‡ First handler")
		return c.Next()
	})

	// Match all routes starting with /api
	app.Use("/api", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
		fmt.Println("ğŸ¥ˆ Second handler")
		return c.Next()
	})

	// GET /api/register
	app.Get("/api/list", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
		fmt.Println("ğŸ¥‰ Last handler")
		return c.SendString("Hello, World ğŸ‘‹!")
	})

	log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

<details>
  <summary>ğŸ“š å±•ç¤ºæ›´å¤šä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹</summary>

### æ¨¡ç‰ˆå¼•æ“

ğŸ“– [é…ç½®](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/fiber#config)
ğŸ“– [æ¨¡ç‰ˆå¼•æ“](https://github.com/gofiber/template)
ğŸ“– [æ¸²æŸ“](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#render)

å¦‚æœæœªè®¾ç½®æ¨¡ç‰ˆå¼•æ“ï¼Œåˆ™`Fiber`é»˜è®¤ä½¿ç”¨ [html/template](https://pkg.go.dev/html/template/)ã€‚

å¦‚æœæ‚¨è¦æ‰§è¡Œéƒ¨åˆ†æ¨¡ç‰ˆæˆ–ä½¿ç”¨å…¶ä»–å¼•æ“ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚[amber](https://github.com/eknkc/amber)ï¼Œ[handlebars](https://github.com/aymerick/raymond)ï¼Œ
[mustache](https://github.com/cbroglie/mustache) æˆ–è€… [pug](https://github.com/Joker/jade)ç­‰

è¯·æŸ¥çœ‹æˆ‘ä»¬çš„ [Template](https://github.com/gofiber/template) åŒ…ï¼Œè¯¥åŒ…æ”¯æŒå¤šä¸ªæ¨¡ç‰ˆå¼•æ“ã€‚

```go
package main

import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/template/pug"
)

func main() {
    // You can setup Views engine before initiation app:
    app := fiber.New(fiber.Config{
        Views: pug.New("./views", ".pug"),
    })

    // And now, you can call template `./views/home.pug` like this:
    app.Get("/", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.Render("home", fiber.Map{
            "title": "Homepage",
            "year":  1999,
        })
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### ç»„åˆè·¯ç”±é“¾

ğŸ“– [è·¯ç”±åˆ†ç»„](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#group)

```go
func middleware(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
    fmt.Println("Don't mind me!")
    return c.Next()
}

func handler(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
    return c.SendString(c.Path())
}

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // Root API route
    api := app.Group("/api", middleware) // /api

    // API v1 routes
    v1 := api.Group("/v1", middleware) // /api/v1
    v1.Get("/list", handler)           // /api/v1/list
    v1.Get("/user", handler)           // /api/v1/user

    // API v2 routes
    v2 := api.Group("/v2", middleware) // /api/v2
    v2.Get("/list", handler)           // /api/v2/list
    v2.Get("/user", handler)           // /api/v2/user

    // ...
}

```

### æ—¥å¿—ä¸­é—´ä»¶

ğŸ“– [Logger](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/logger)

```go
package main

import (
    "log"

    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/logger"
)

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Use(logger.New())

    // ...

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### è·¨åŸŸèµ„æºå…±äº«(CORS)ä¸­é—´ä»¶

ğŸ“– [CORS](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/cors)

```go
import (
    "log"

    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/cors"
)

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Use(cors.New())

    // ...

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

é€šè¿‡åœ¨è¯·æ±‚å¤´ä¸­è®¾ç½® `Origin` ä¼ é€’ä»»ä½•åŸŸæ¥æ£€æŸ¥ CORS ï¼š

```bash
curl -H "Origin: http://example.com" --verbose http://localhost:3000
```

### è‡ªå®šä¹‰ 404 å“åº”

ğŸ“– [HTTP Methods](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#status)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Static("/", "./public")

    app.Get("/demo", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendString("This is a demo!")
    })

    app.Post("/register", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendString("Welcome!")
    })

    // Last middleware to match anything
    app.Use(func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendStatus(404)
        // => 404 "Not Found"
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### JSON å“åº”

ğŸ“– [JSON](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#json)

```go
type User struct {
    Name string `json:"name"`
    Age  int    `json:"age"`
}

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Get("/user", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.JSON(&User{"John", 20})
        // => {"name":"John", "age":20}
    })

    app.Get("/json", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.JSON(fiber.Map{
            "success": true,
            "message": "Hi John!",
        })
        // => {"success":true, "message":"Hi John!"}
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### ä½¿ç”¨ WebSocket ä¸­é—´ä»¶

ğŸ“– [Websocket](https://github.com/gofiber/websocket)

```go
import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/websocket"
)

func main() {
  app := fiber.New()

  app.Get("/ws", websocket.New(func(c *websocket.Conn) {
    for {
      mt, msg, err := c.ReadMessage()
      if err != nil {
        log.Println("read:", err)
        break
      }
      log.Printf("recv: %s", msg)
      err = c.WriteMessage(mt, msg)
      if err != nil {
        log.Println("write:", err)
        break
      }
    }
  }))

  log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
  // ws://localhost:3000/ws
}
```

### Server-Sent Events

ğŸ“– [More Info](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Server-sent_events/Using_server-sent_events)

```go
import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/valyala/fasthttp"
)

func main() {
  app := fiber.New()

  app.Get("/sse", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
    c.Set("Content-Type", "text/event-stream")
    c.Set("Cache-Control", "no-cache")
    c.Set("Connection", "keep-alive")
    c.Set("Transfer-Encoding", "chunked")

    c.Context().SetBodyStreamWriter(fasthttp.StreamWriter(func(w *bufio.Writer) {
      fmt.Println("WRITER")
      var i int

      for {
        i++
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("%d - the time is %v", i, time.Now())
        fmt.Fprintf(w, "data: Message: %s\n\n", msg)
        fmt.Println(msg)

        w.Flush()
        time.Sleep(5 * time.Second)
      }
    }))

    return nil
  })

  log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### æ¢å¤(panic)ä¸­é—´ä»¶

ğŸ“– [Recover](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/recover)

```go
import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/recover"
)

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Use(recover.New())

    app.Get("/", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        panic("normally this would crash your app")
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

</details>
